member.summary: Parses the value as Decimal.

member.summary: Parses the value as Double.

member.summary: Displays the entered value with percentage symbol.

member.summary: Computes the entered value as percentage and displays with percentage symbol.

member.summary: Value change is updated after the control loses focus.

member.summary: Value change is updated on every key press.

member.summary: Value updated with group separator after the control loses focus.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfNumericTextBox.XForms.GroupSeparatorMode.Always
member.summary: Value updated with group separator on every key press.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfNumericTextBox.XForms.SfNumericTextBox
member.summary: Represents a control that allows users enter only numeric values. It can be configured to display different formats such as currency format, scientific format, etc.

member.summary: Gets or sets the value of Maximum. It is used to set the maximum value in numeric text box. You cannot increase the value after this range.

member.summary: Gets or sets the value of Minimum. It is used to set the Minimum value in numeric text box. You cannot decrease the value after this range.
